import Link from 'next/link' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' const SingleJournal = ({journal}) => { return (

{`${journal.title}`}

Author: {journal.author.name} || Created At: {moment(journal.updatedAt).fromNow()}

Blog categories and Tags

image
{renderHTML(journal.democontent)}
Read more
) } export default SingleJournal
